name: The Spirit of The Hawk
description:
This is a submission to Mini Jam 25:Spirits

Play as a young Native American warrior, fighting for his tribe that has recently been poisoned. Turns out there's a nasty spirit that's behind all of this, so you're gonna make him pay.

Instructions:

Left / right - character select and movement

Z - attack

R - restart the game (only if you died or won the game)
